about_the_game:
Specter is a Ghost Hunting game, With over 10 Planned Locations Inspired by Real, and Unusual Places.

20 Different Ghost Types, with 3 Evidence Per Ghost Type. and 11 Evidence Total.

With EMF Readers, Thermometers, UV Lights, Parabolic Mics, and Cameras as your Main Evidence Items.

In the full release, Some maps will have a Story Level:

The Story Levels vary in Style. Some will be Actual gameplay, While others will be more Cutscene-like,

The purpose of the Story Levels is to show you how a place got Haunted, or why a place was Abandoned.

The Safe HouseIn the safe house, you'll be able to access Story Levels, Arcade Levels,
and Upgrades for you, and your equipment.
On The Ghost Tab, You'll be able to do investigations at Most of the Maps,
Complete with Hunts, and Stress Mechanics.
And the story levels


In the Arcade, You'll have access to all the maps from the Investigations, Tab,
As well as Bonus Maps! the first of which, being The Ghost Ship
the Arcade Investigations have no Hunts or Stress Mechanics

As for player upgrades,

You'll be able to upgrade all of the Equipment Items,
From Better Range, to quicker activation, and more accurate results

And the Player,
From faster walk speed, to better visibility in the Dark.

Each item starts out with 2 Available Upgrades, But more are planned for the future.

every two Successful investigation gives you an Upgrade PointYou'll need 20 Upgrade Points to unlock everything

Single Player only

Made in Unreal Engine 5.4
